files.description: Entry-point script that executes a minimal reproducible pipeline run and always writes ./outputs/run_stamp.json and ./outputs/run.log with canonical metadata and logging.
Integration test that runs scripts/run_pipeline.py and asserts outputs/run_stamp.json and outputs/run.log exist and that the JSON contains the expected schema keys.
GitHub Actions CI workflow that sets up Python, installs dependencies, and runs pytest to enforce artifact generation and schema checks on every push and PR.

missionDescription: Create scripts/run_pipeline.py that writes run_stamp.json + run.log to ./outputs, add tests/test_pipeline_artifacts.py that runs the entrypoint and asserts files exist + JSON schema keys, and wire it into CI.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
